============================
rinoh-typeface-texgyretermes
============================

This package provides the `TeX Gyre Termes`_ typeface for use with rinohtype_.
TeX Gyre Termes is based on URW Nimbus Roman No9 L and can be used as a
replacement for Times (new) Roman.

.. _TeX Gyre Termes: http://www.gust.org.pl/projects/e-foundry/tex-gyre/termes
.. _rinohtype: https://github.com/brechtm/rinohtype#readme
